org.hibernate.search.util.impl

Class FileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.util.impl.FileHelper

  • public class FileHelper
extends Object
    Utility class for file and directory operations, like synchronisation and reading from class path.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard, Sanne Grinovero, Hardy Ferentschik

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      Deletes a file.

                               Path destination,
                               boolean smart)
                        throws IOException
        Throws:

      • delete

        public static void delete(Path path)
                   throws IOException
        Deletes a file. If the file is a directory delete recursively all content.
        Parameters:
        path - the file or directory to be deleted
        Throws:
        IOException - if it wasn't possible to delete all content.

      • tryDelete

        public static void tryDelete(Path path)
                      throws IOException
        Attempts to delete a file. If the file is a directory delete recursively all content. Any IOException preventing a file to be deleted will be swallowed.
        Parameters:
        path - the file or directory to be deleted
        Throws:
        IOException - on unexpected io errors
